examples: The ice cracked as I stepped onto it.
El hielo se rompió cuando pisé.
He has cracked a bone in his arm.
Se ha roto un hueso del brazo.
A chunk of the cliff had cracked off in a storm.
Un trozo del acantilado se había roto en una tormenta.
His face cracked into a smile.
Su rostro se quebró en una sonrisa.
